name: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned meth maker partners with a former student to secure his family's future.

name: El Camino
description: In the wake of his dramatic escape from captivity, Jesse must come to terms with his past in order to forge some kind of future.

name: Better Call Saul
description: Better Call Saul is the prequel to the award-winning series Breaking Bad, set six years before Saul Goodman (Bob Odenkirk) became Walter White's lawyer. When we meet him, the man who will become Saul Goodman is known as Jimmy McGill, a small-time lawyer searching for his destiny, and, more immediately, hustling to make ends meet.

1.quote: I would recommend it to everyone but be warned the series is slow. but if you like the slow pace and the character development it is a must watch

2.quote: The character development is amazing and the story is very well written. The series is slow but it is worth it

3.quote: The series is slow but the character development is amazing. The story is very well written and the acting is amazing

4.quote: The Trouble you would see in Breaking Bad starts to grow here. Less slow and more action

1.quote: Better Call Saul is a quirky, dark character study that manages to stand on its own without being overshadowed by the series that spawned it.

2.quote: Better Call Saul continues to tighten its hold on viewers with a batch of episodes that inject a surge of dramatic energy while showcasing the charms of its talented lead.

3.quote: Better Call Saul shows no signs of slipping in season 3, as the introduction of more familiar faces causes the inevitable transformation of its lead to pick up speed.

4.quote: Better Call Saul is a quirky, dark character study that manages to stand on its own without being overshadowed by the series that spawned it.

episodes.title: Duo
episodes.description: The opener of a prequel tracing the evolution of 'Breaking Bad' lawyer Saul Goodman finds Jimmy McGill working his magic in the courtroom. Then, unexpected inspiration leads him to an unconventional pursuit of potential clients.

cliff.text: Jimmy McGill gets a gun pointed to hes head

episodes.title: Mijo
episodes.description: Jimmy seizes an opportunity to reconnect with an old friend. Chuck adjusts to a new way of life.

episodes.title: Nacho
episodes.description: Jimmy pulls out all the stops to prove that his dangerous client is innocent, even though it causes some friction with Kim.

episodes.title: Hero
episodes.description: Jimmy conjures up a bold plan to solicit new clients, but has to face the consequences when the scheme strains his relationship with a rival firm.

cliff.text: Chuck McGill sees jimmy in the newspaper

episodes.title: Alpine Shepherd Boy
episodes.description: When his efforts to drum up new business are interrupted by alarg news, Jimmy is pressured to make a difficult choice.

cliff.text: Police standing in front of Mike Ehrmantraut`s home

episodes.title: Five-O
episodes.description: Mike's tragic past comes back to haunt him, and he's forced to seek help from an unusual source. Meanwhile, Jimmy's moral compass is put to the test.

deaths.text:
Officer Matthew 'Matt' Ehrmantraut (mentioned)
Sergeant Jack Fenske killed by Mike Ehrmantraut
Officer Troy Hoffman killed by Mike Ehrmantraut

episodes.title: Bingo
episodes.description: Jimmy meets with potential new clients. Then, when given the opportunity to do the right thing, he cashes in a favor from an unlikely ally.

episodes.title: Rico
episodes.description: Jimmy shows Chuck that he's willing to do almost anything to win a case, even if it means getting his hands dirty.

episodes.title: Pimento
episodes.description: Chuck wants to transfer the Sandpiper case to HHM, but Jimmy's decision to take the case to a law firm known for fraud cases leaves Chuck appalled.

episodes.title: Marco
episodes.description: Jimmy seizes the opportunity to reconnect with an old friend. Chuck adjusts to a new way of life.

deaths.text: Marco Pasternak by a heart attack

episodes.title: Switch
episodes.description: Jimmy and Kim's relationship takes a new turn. Mike decides it's for the best to sever his affiliation with an unrestrained associate.

episodes.title: Cobbler
episodes.description: Jimmy's actions unexpectedly create waves for Kim. Mike cautiously weighs a lucrative proposal that might bring about dire consequences.

episodes.title: Amarillo
episodes.description: Jimmy's client outreach efforts thrive, and he exhibits new heights of showmanship. Mike is perplexed by daughter-in-law Stacey's troubling news.

episodes.title: Gloves Off
episodes.description: Jimmy's actions unexpectedly create waves for Kim. Mike cautiously weighs a lucrative proposal that might bring about dire consequences.

episodes.title: Rebecca
episodes.description: Jimmy becomes frustrated with his restrictive work environment. Kim pulls out all the stops to dig herself out of a seemingly bottomless hole at HHM.

episodes.title: Bali Ha'i
episodes.description: Jimmy finds comfort in a familiar place. Kim receives a life-changing proposal. Mike is pushed to the limit when what he holds dearest is threatened.

episodes.title: Inflatable
episodes.description: Jimmy meets with potential new clients. Then, when given the opportunity to do the right thing, he cashes in a favor from an unlikely ally.

episodes.title: Fifi
episodes.description: Mike's growing frustration shows when his hand is forced, but with Jimmy's help, he works to keep the peace. Meanwhile, Jimmy boldly forges a new path forward.

episodes.title: Nailed
episodes.description: Mike takes a methodical approach to his mission. Someone questions Chuck's capabilities. Jimmy faces a personal dilemma.

episodes.title: Klick
episodes.description: Jimmy is forced to make a hard choice. Mike takes matters into his own hands. Hamlin relays shocking news while Chuck's condition continues to evolve.

name: Cyberpunk Edgerunners
description: A Street Kid trying to survive in a technology and body modification-obsessed city of the future. Having everything to lose, he chooses to stay alive by becoming an Edgerunner, a Mercenary outlaw also known as a Cyberpunk.

episodes.title: Let You Down
episodes.description: After a night of streaming illegal braindance, David wakes up to reality: a rundown apartment with a broken washing machine and an overworked mother.

deaths.text:
Unnamed NCPD Police Officer - Shot in the head by James Norris
26 Unnamed NCPD Police Officers - Shot and slain by James Norris.
James Norris - Shot in the head by MaxTac team.
Gloria Martinez - Mortally injured by the Animals gang and later died of her injuries.

episodes.title: Like A Boy
episodes.description: With his newly enhanced body, David heads to the Academy seeking revenge on his bully. Later, he meets a mysterious woman who wants to recruit him.

cliff.text: David is grabbed out of a BD and and gets a heavy punch by a cyberpunk

episodes.title: Smooth Criminal
episodes.description: Surrounded by a group of rowdy edgerunners, David makes a plea to join their team. Meanwhile, sinister forces plot to lure him back to Arasaka Academy.

deaths.text:
The Butcher - Stabbed in the head by an unknown fighter.
Unnamed Tyger Claws Gang Member - Run over and killed by an oncoming truck.
Unnamed Tyger Claws Gang Member - Blown up and killed by Maine.

episodes.title: Lucky You
episodes.description: Eager to learn the edgerunner ropes, David pesters Maine for another mission. Instead, Maine tasks Lucy with training him.

deaths.text:
Unnamed Scavenger - Shot in the head by Rebecca.
Two Unnamed Scavengers - Punched and killed by Dorio.
Three Unnamed Scavengers - Blown up and killed by Pilar.
Unnamed Maelstrom Gang Member - Shot in the head by Maine.
Five Unnamed Maelstrom Gang Members - Slaughtered by Dorio, Pilar and Kiwi.
Pilar - Shot in the head by an unnamed cyberpsycho.
Unnamed Cyberpsycho - Shot in the head by David Martinez and decapitated by Maine.

episodes.title: All Eyez On Me
episodes.description: David makes a clever suggestion when the team strategizes for their next mission. However, he soon learns that their target can't be underestimated.

deaths.text: Jimmy Kurosaki - Shot in the neck by Tanaka.

episodes.title: Girl on Fire
episodes.description: Maine doesn’t seem to be himself. But the team has bigger fish to fry: They must race against time to extract vital information from their prisoner.

deaths.text:
Tanaka - Short circuited as his neural implant shorted out.
Unnamed Traumatic Team Member - Shot in the chest by Dorio.
Eight Unnamed Traumatic Team Members - Shot and killed by Maine.
Dorio - Shot in the head by a Traumatic Team member.
Three Unnamed NCPD Police Officer - Blown up and killed by Maine.
Unnamed Traumatic Team member - Neck broken by Maine.
Five Unnamed NCPD Police Officers - Killed by Maine.
Five Unnamed Traumatic Team Members - Blown up and killed by Maine.
Unnamed NCPD Police Officer - Shot in the abdomen by Maine.
Unnamed NCPD Police Officer - Punched and killed by Maine.
Maine - Committed suicide by blowing himself up.
Four Unnamed NCPD Police Officers - Blown up and killed in an explosion caused by Maine.

episodes.title: Stronger
episodes.description: Now an all-star edgerunner enhanced with more cybernetics, David leads his team into a new mission. An old contact reaches out to him for a big job.

cliff.text: Lucy has red eyes and killed someone

deaths.text:
Unnamed Maelstrom Gang Member - Shot in the head by David Martinez.
24 Unnamed Maelstrom Gang Members - Shot and blown up by Rebecca.
Four Unnamed Maelstrom Gang Members - Head blown up by Rebecca.
Six Unnamed Maelstrom Gang Members - Shot and killed by a turret controlled by Kiwi.
Unnamed Maelstrom Gang Brute - Shot in the head by David Martinez.
Julio - Blown up and killed after accidentally activating a hidden trap.
Eight Unnamed Arasaka Netrunners - Killed during a net deep-dive.
Three Unnamed Arasaka Guards - Killed by Lucy and other surviving netrunners.
Four Unnamed Arasaka Netrunners - Shot and killed by Arasaka guards.
Unnamed Arasaka Agent - Short circuited by Lucy.

episodes.title: Stay
episodes.description: Faraday finds himself stuck between Arasaka and Militech. Lucy and Rebecca confront David about his change in behavior, but he refuses to listen.

deaths.text:
Jaime - Shot in the head by David Martinez.
Marcus - Shot and killed by David Martinez.
Two of Faraday's Guards - Shot in the head and killed by Animals gang.
Three Unnamed Animals Gang Members - Blown up and killed by unnamed man.
Four Unnamed Animals Gang Members - Shot in the head and killed by unnamed man.
Three Unnamed Gang Members - Shot and killed by Rebecca.
13 Unnamed Gang Members - Shot and killed by David Martinez and Rebecca.
Unnamed Gang Member - Shot in the head and killed by Rebecca.
Director Evans - Shot in the head and killed by David Martinez.
Unnamed Woman - Shot in the head and killed by David Martinez.

episodes.title: Humanity
episodes.description: Lucy’s captors learn about her secret mission and dark past. David and his team head out to complete Faraday’s job but realize that something is off.

deaths.text:
Three Unnamed Animals Gang Members - Shot and killed by Arasaka guards.
Two Unnamed Animals Gang Members - Cars wrecked and killed by Arasaka guards.
Two Unnamed Arasaka Guards - Car wrecked and killed by David Martinez and Rebecca.
Three Unnamed Arasaka Guards - Shot in the head by David Martinez.
Two of Faraday's Guards - Decapitated by Lucy.
13 Unnamed Militech Guards - Shot and killed by David Martinez.
Seven Unnamed Militech Guards - Crushed and killed by David Martinez.

episodes.title: My Moon My Man
episodes.description: On the edge of cyberpsychosis but determined to save Lucy, David storms into Night City as Arasaka plots to deploy their ultimate lethal weapon.

deaths.text:
Three Unnamed Arasaka Guards - Impaled by harpoon fired by Rebecca.
Four Unnamed Arasaka Guards - Shot and killed by David Martinez.
41 Unnamed Arasaka Guards - Blown up in an explosion caused by David Martinez and Rebecca.
33 Unnamed Arasaka Guards - Wrecked and killed caused by David Martinez.
Three Unnamed Arasaka Guards - Shot and killed by Rebecca.
Three Unnamed Arasaka Guards - Died in an explosion caused by David Martinez.
Four Unnamed Arasaka Guards - Shot and killed by David Martinez.
Four Unnamed Arasaka Guards - Died in an explosion caused by David Martinez.
Unnamed Faraday's Lackey - Short circuited by Kiwi.
Kiwi - Shot in the head by an unnamed Faraday's lackey.
Ten Unnamed Arasaka Guards - Slain by David Martinez.
Three Unnamed Traumatic Team Members - Bisected by David Martinez.
Faraday - Falls and crushed to death.
Rebecca - Crushed and killed by Adam Smasher.
David Martinez - Shot in the head by Adam Smasher.

name: Invincible
description: Mark Grayson is a normal teenager, except for the fact that his father is the most powerful superhero on the planet. Shortly after his seventeenth birthday, Mark begins to develop powers of his own and enters into his father's tutelage.

episodes.title: IT’S ABOUT TIME
episodes.description: When Mark Grayson finally inherits powers from his superhero father, it’s a dream come true. But there’s more to being a hero than just choosing a name and costume.

episodes.title: HERE GOES NOTHING
episodes.description: With his father out of action, Mark struggles to defend the city against an interdimensional invasion, joining forces with a team of teenage superheroes.

episodes.title: WHO YOU CALLING UGLY?
episodes.description: Mark has to cut a study date short to help save Mount Rushmore from a crazed scientist. Robot deals with drama as he assembles a new team of world-saving superheroes.

episodes.title: NEIL ARMSTRONG, EAT YOUR HEART OUT
episodes.description: It’s two firsts for Mark: a first date and a first trip to another planet. At the same time, Nolan and Debbie revisit their own first vacation together.

episodes.title: THAT ACTUALLY HURT
episodes.description: Feeling confident in his new abilities, Mark risks a team-up with a local villain to take down a crime lord, while simultaneously juggling school and a new relationship.

episodes.title: YOU LOOK KINDA DEAD
episodes.description: Mark joins William and Amber on a campus visit to Upstate University, hoping to discover a new future for himself. Debbie makes her own disturbing discovery.

episodes.title: WE NEED TO TALK
episodes.description: Feeling lost and confused, Mark looks for advice from Eve. At the same time, everyone’s looking for him.

episodes.title: WHERE I REALLY COME FROM
episodes.description: Mark must prove he’s become the hero he’s always wanted to be by stopping an unstoppable force.

episodes.title: I'm Used to It
episodes.description: Around ten years ago, gates that connected our world to another dimension began to appear, leading to the rise of hunters who would traverse these gates to fight the magic beasts within. Sung Jinwoo, E-Rank hunter, is the weakest of them all.

episodes.title: If I Had One More Chance
episodes.description: Jinwoo and his party appear to have cleared a low-level dungeon, when a hidden path to an unfamiliar temple is revealed. There they encounter a set of commandments and a group of monsters that cause them absolute despair.

episodes.title: It's Like a Game
episodes.description: Jinwoo remains behind in the temple dungeon to save his few surviving party members, and with a swing from the god statue's blade, his life comes to an end—or so it seems, before he wakes up in a hospital bed.

episodes.title: I've Gotta Get Stronger
episodes.description: Having entered the instance dungeon located inside the subway, Jinwoo levels up time and time again by fighting waves of magic beasts. As he gradually makes his way forward, he finds a long stairway leading deeper underground.

episodes.title: A Pretty Good Deal
episodes.description: Jinwoo joins a party led by Hwang Dongsuk to meet the headcount necessary for a C-Rank dungeon. Joined by another temporary hire, Yoo Jinho, the party defeats beasts without much trouble, but Jinwoo has suspicions about the group's lack of a healer.

episodes.title: The Real Hunt Begins
episodes.description: While the C-Rank dungeon raid by Jinwoo and the others seems to be progressing well, the moment they step into an area covered in mana stones with a sleeping dungeon boss, things take a wrong turn.

episodes.title: Let's See How Far I Can Go
episodes.description: As Jinwoo continues his training, he completes a daily quest one day by doing more than the quest requires, and a key that leads to a certain item appears in front of him.

episodes.title: This Is Frustrating
episodes.description: Jinwoo answers a Hunter's Association request to take part in the raid of a D-Rank dungeon, where he encounters a few familiar faces.

episodes.title: You've Been Hiding Your Skills
episodes.description: At the D-Rank raid, Jinwoo is reunited with four of the Cartenon Temple survivors. Together, they explore the dungeon with Kang Taeshik and his men. After splitting up, they hear a scream, and then...

episodes.title: What Is This, a Picnic?
episodes.description: Jinwoo survives tragedy once again, but Woo Jinchul warns him that Hwang Dongsoo, an S-Rank hunter, may be after his life. Determined to grow stronger, Jinwoo teams up with Jinho to raid a succession of C-Rank dungeons, but they attract attention...

episodes.title: A Knight Who Defends an Empty Throne
episodes.description: Out of the blue, a 'job-change quest' pops up in Jinwoo's window. Feeling that it may help him get stronger, he enters the gate. Inside, he fights wave after wave of enemies, culminating in a knight who brings back memories of the Cartenon Temple.

episodes.title: Arise
episodes.description: Drained from endless battle, Jinwoo sees a phantom of his past self. To overcome his own past as the Weakest Hunter of All Mankind, he struggles to find a way to clear the job-change quest.
